key.name: take-window-shot
key.description: Grab just the current window, rather than the whole desktop. This key has been deprecated and it is no longer in use.

key.name: delay
key.description: The number of seconds to wait before taking the screenshot.

key.name: auto-save-directory
key.description: The directory where the screenshots will be saved by default.

key.name: last-save-directory
key.description: The last directory a screenshot was saved in interactive mode.

key.name: include-pointer
key.description: Include the pointer in the screenshot

key.name: include-icc-profile
key.description: Include the ICC profile of the target in the screenshot file

key.name: default-file-type
key.description: The default file type extension for screenshots.
